name: egret-animate
description: A library for bridging Adobe Animate HTML5 export to egret-core

scripts.build: uglifyjs --compress -- src/main.js src/utils.js src/DisplayObject.js src/DisplayObjectContainer.js src/Bitmap.js src/Graphics.js src/MovieClip.js src/Shape.js src/Text.js > dist/egret-animate.min.js

author: Endel Dreyer
